trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class from which all dynamic update notifications of changes to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>s must be derived.
This class can be used by a tracking service to determine that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been dynamically updated.

The derived classes indicate which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> is being dynamically updated, and what operation is being performed (added to the workflow, removed from the workflow, or changed).
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to be changed.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to be changed.
When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> changes are occurring in.
